definitions.definition: The early part of the day , especially from midnight to noon .
examples: I'm working in the morning , so let's meet in the afternoon.

definitions.definition: That part of the day from dawn until the main meal (typically in late afternoon).
The first alcoholic drink of the day; a morning draught .

main_definition: The early part of the day , especially from midnight to noon . [from 13th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) The early part of anything. [from 16th c.]
( obsolete ) That part of the day from dawn until the main meal (typically in late afternoon). [18th–19th c.]
( chiefly Scotland ) The first alcoholic drink of the day; a morning draught . [from 18th c.]
